Accuracy.description: The extent to which the solution is error-free and mathematically correct.

Efficiency.description: The simplicity and conciseness of the solution that allows for an easy understanding.

Clarity.description: The clarity of the solution in terms of explanation, logic, and reasoning provided.

Step-by-step_solution.description: Assessment of the solution's breakdown into distinct, logical steps.

Appropriate_techniques.description: The use of relevant techniques and concepts to address and solve the math problem.
